title: Castigator

fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Neutral Chaos
Attack: Powerful
Defense: None (Basic)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Patrol a target's house tonight, learning whether or not they're a `Criminal`. If they are, you'll roleblock them. If they aren't, you'll prevent anyone besides you from visiting them tonight and mark anyone who attempted to do so as a `Criminal`.
- Select a target to purify of sins. If they're a `Criminal`, you'll deal an Astral attack to them. If they're not, this ability does nothing. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities primarily interact with `Criminals`. Whenever a non-Neutral player...
> - Attacks a non-`Criminal`
> - Was the first vote of a hanging that killed a non-`Criminal`
> - Disturbs the peace of non-`Criminals` thrice (roleblocking, redirection, blackmailing, prevention, etc.; host interpretation)
... they are permanently marked as a `Criminal`. You'll no longer mark anyone after you die, but `Criminals` still remain `Criminals`.
- Anyone with detection immunity cannot be marked as a `Criminal`.

fields.name: Alignment (cont.):
fields.value:
- You have a one-use Basic autovest. You also have permanent Basic defense against all `Criminals`.
- You will know which faction has the most `Criminals` at all times.
- Roleblock, redirect, detection and prevention immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the faction with the most `Criminals` lose, with at least 2 `Criminals` dead. You may win while dead.

desc:
Post 3355
*I seek **justice**, and I will stop at nothing to achieve it.*
